xwikidoc.title: CurriculumWelcome
xwikidoc.content:
#** * Welcome text for welcome block on the currikulum page * @translate This page requires full translation * @type content * @refactored ludovic *# This tab provides access to the group's curriculum resources in the Curriki repository.
Here you can view or search all individual contributions by group members, or locate curriculum through the group's organized collections.
Group members can use the "Add a Group Collection" button below to start a new collection for this group.
